content:
Your task is to create python puzzle chunks. 
        Each chunk should end in statement result = ..., variable that will store the result of the code.
        Please, don't provide anything else than the code, no questions, no answers, no hints, nothing.
Give me a python puzzle involving dictionaries. It should have at most 5 lines of code

my_dict = {'a': 1, 'b': 2, 'c': 3}
result = {k:v for k,v in my_dict.items() if v % 2 == 0}
